events.message: I have not received my package even though it was supposed to arrive three days ago. The tracking information has not been updated.
The customer's issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the mention of late arrival and tracking issues.
Assigning the case to delivery support team to investigate the status of the delayed shipment.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that your package has not arrived yet. Let me help you track it and resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the tracking code you have so I can check with the courier service?
Sure, the order number is 784512 and the tracking number is TRK123456789, but the tracking page shows no updates since the shipment left the warehouse.
I have contacted the delivery service and they confirmed there was a delay due to unforeseen circumstances. They expect to deliver your package within the next two days.
Thanks for the update. I’m disappointed it’s delayed but I appreciate knowing when to expect it.
We will keep monitoring the shipment status, and you should receive your package within two days. Please contact us if the delay extends further.
Hello again! Just checking in to confirm that your package has arrived as expected. Please let us know if there are any further issues.
Yes, the package arrived today and everything is in good condition. Thanks for your help resolving this.
Closing this case as your delivery issue has been successfully resolved and the package has been received.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email to gather your feedback on how we handled your delivery delay issue.
